727    public Customer build() {
728        Objects.requireNonNull(id, Customer.class + ": id is missing");
729        Objects.requireNonNull(version, Customer.class + ": version is missing");
730        Objects.requireNonNull(createdAt, Customer.class + ": createdAt is missing");
731        Objects.requireNonNull(lastModifiedAt, Customer.class + ": lastModifiedAt is missing");
732        Objects.requireNonNull(email, Customer.class + ": email is missing");
733        Objects.requireNonNull(addresses, Customer.class + ": addresses is missing");
734        Objects.requireNonNull(isEmailVerified, Customer.class + ": isEmailVerified is missing");
735        Objects.requireNonNull(authenticationMode, Customer.class + ": authenticationMode is missing");
736        return new CustomerImpl(id, version, createdAt, lastModifiedAt, key, customerNumber, externalId, lastModifiedBy,
737            createdBy, email, password, firstName, lastName, middleName, title, dateOfBirth, companyName, vatId,
738            addresses, defaultShippingAddressId, shippingAddressIds, defaultBillingAddressId, billingAddressIds,
739            isEmailVerified, customerGroup, custom, locale, salutation, stores, authenticationMode);
740    }

756    public static CustomerBuilder of(final Customer template) {
757        CustomerBuilder builder = new CustomerBuilder();
758        builder.id = template.getId();
759        builder.version = template.getVersion();
760        builder.createdAt = template.getCreatedAt();
761        builder.lastModifiedAt = template.getLastModifiedAt();
762        builder.key = template.getKey();
763        builder.customerNumber = template.getCustomerNumber();
764        builder.externalId = template.getExternalId();
765        builder.lastModifiedBy = template.getLastModifiedBy();
766        builder.createdBy = template.getCreatedBy();
767        builder.email = template.getEmail();
768        builder.password = template.getPassword();
769        builder.firstName = template.getFirstName();
770        builder.lastName = template.getLastName();
771        builder.middleName = template.getMiddleName();
772        builder.title = template.getTitle();
773        builder.dateOfBirth = template.getDateOfBirth();
774        builder.companyName = template.getCompanyName();
775        builder.vatId = template.getVatId();
776        builder.addresses = template.getAddresses();
777        builder.defaultShippingAddressId = template.getDefaultShippingAddressId();
778        builder.shippingAddressIds = template.getShippingAddressIds();
779        builder.defaultBillingAddressId = template.getDefaultBillingAddressId();
780        builder.billingAddressIds = template.getBillingAddressIds();
781        builder.isEmailVerified = template.getIsEmailVerified();
782        builder.customerGroup = template.getCustomerGroup();
783        builder.custom = template.getCustom();
784        builder.locale = template.getLocale();
785        builder.salutation = template.getSalutation();
786        builder.stores = template.getStores();
787        builder.authenticationMode = template.getAuthenticationMode();
788        return builder;
789    }
790
791}
